summary: A mobile app for tracking learning video engagement from YouTube and Instagram Reels. Features admin panel for adding video links with automatic thumbnails, user watch status tracking (watched/watch later/already watched), push notifications for new videos and 24-hour reminders, and admin dashboard to view user engagement records.
architectural_notes: Mobile app with funky, colorful visual design
User role for video consumption and status tracking
Integration with YouTube and Instagram APIs for thumbnail extraction
Push notification system for new content and reminders

existing_features.title: Create an admin authentication system that allows designated users to access admin-only features for managing video links
Implement admin panel where admins can paste YouTube or Instagram Reels video links and submit them to the system
Automatically extract and display YouTube thumbnails for YouTube links and Instagram cover images for Instagram Reels links when admin pastes a video URL
Create main view that displays a scrollable list of all video links with their thumbnails, ordered by most recent first
For each video in the list, provide three selectable watch status options: 'Yeah, I've watched it', 'I'll watch it later', and 'No, I don't want to watch it, I've already watched it'
Create admin dashboard view that displays engagement records showing which users have watched which videos and their selected watch statuses
Design the entire app interface with a funky, colorful visual theme featuring vibrant colors, playful typography, and energetic design elements that work well on mobile devices
Update the logo link text in the header navigation from 'Funky Video Tracker' to 'Learning Videos' at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]
Update the HTML document title from 'Funky Video Tracker' to 'Learning Videos' in frontend/index.html

Replace the header logo image element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1] in the Layout component with the uploaded image file showing the neon green arrow design and 'LEARNING VIDEOS' text

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin panel to paste and manage YouTube and Instagram Reel links
Automatic thumbnail/cover extraction from video links
Push notifications to all users when new video link is added
Main view displaying list of video links with thumbnails
User watch status options: 'Yeah, I've watched it', 'I'll watch it later', 'No, I don't want to watch it, I've already watched it'
Track and record which users have watched which videos
Admin dashboard to view user engagement records
Send push notifications to all registered users immediately when admin adds a new video link to the system
Track and store which users have selected which watch status for each video, including timestamps of when selections were made
Implement automated reminder notification system that sends push notifications to users who have not selected any watch status for a video within 24 hours of that video being posted
